item.description:
Hello, I’m Weijiang Xiong (熊伟江), a master student at Aalto University, welcome to my website! At Aalto, I’m taking a major in Robotics and Autonomous Systems, and a minor Machine Learning (probably the de facto major ^-^). In my first year, I took intensive courses in machine learning, and completed 96 ECTS with GPA 4.86/5. After that, I joined the Probabilistic Machine Learning Group as a summer intern and worked on Bayesian Deep Learning. Right now I’m having an wonderful exchange semester at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne, and hosted by the Visual Intelligence for Transportation (VITA) lab.

Before I came to Aalto, I got my bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering from Tongji University, where I focused my study on Mechatronics. Upon graduation, I ranked 3/114 in my department with GPA 4.58/5, and seized the award of Excellent Graduates in Shanghai. I completed two research programs, including my bachelor’s thesis, in Vision4Robotics Group under the supervision of Prof. Changhong Fu, and the projects were both centered on Visual Object Tracking.

For the rest of my study, I will concentrate more on practice-oriented machine learning approaches, as well as their deployment, so that we could benefit from them in real life. You can find my latest resume here. Hoping to find master thesis, internships and relevant jobs!
